roleset.name: generally awful; morally bad, fearsome, displeasing

example.name: both args
example.text: He is terrible to his children.

roleset.note: Updated by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, bad.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: But the booing of the soldier was terrible make no mistake .

roleset.name: extremely unskilled at
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on bad.02.

example.name: both args
example.text: Daniel Radcliffe admits he is ''terrible'' at balancing his work and personal life.
example.arg: at balancing his work and personal life

roleset.name: extremely unbeneficial, unhealthy
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on bad.04

example.name: both args
example.text: Just exercise a bit more here, we'll even help with some tips and then you won't notice that our product is terrible for you.
